item.title: MCollective Made Easy
item.description:
Choria makes installing The Marionette Collective easy and secure for users of Puppet 4.

You could be up and running in under 30 minutes.

item.title: Secure
item.description: The Puppet CA is reused for TLS connections and user Authentication. Authorization and Auditing is set up out of the box and fully functional.

item.title: Batteries Included
item.description: Includes plugins to manage Packages, Services, File and orchestrate Puppet. Tightly integrates with PuppetDB and supports deploying Puppet Multi Node Applications.

item.title: Easy Connectivity
item.description: Relies on the easy to use and light weight NATS middleware to ease the pain of running a connectivity layer. Scales to thousands of nodes on a single server.
